title: Azure Boards Quick SLA Guide -Services OR Server.
description: Customer-facing scoping questionnaire for Boards issues

requiredFields: What is the organization's name or Azure DevOps Server version?
Which project(s) are affected?
Which team(s) are affected?
What is the error returned? Do you have any screenshots of the error?
Provide a detailed description of the issue.
When did the issue start?
Did this work previously, or has it never worked?

Could you please capture a Fiddler or HAR trace of the issue reproduction? You can upload the resulting files to the File Transfer link provided.
  • [Capture a browser trace for troubleshooting - Azure DevOps | Microsoft Learn](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/user-guide/capture-browser-trace?view=azure-devops&tabs=microsoft-edge)
  • [How to collect a network trace | Microsoft Learn](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-web-pubsub/howto-troubleshoot-network-trace)

Provide a couple of affected Work Item (WI) IDs and the following information for each (please include a screenshot):
  • Work Item Type
  • Area Path
  • Iteration Path
  • State
Are there any Work Items for which this is working? If so, please provide a couple of examples and the fields requested in the previous point.

For Backlog issues:
  • Is this a Sprint or a Requirement/Portfolio backlog? Please send a screenshot of the affected backlog.
  • What are the Area Paths and Iterations assigned to the team of the backlog? Please send a screenshot.
  • Do you have any filters currently set?
Is this a Sprint or a Kanban (Requirement/Portfolio) Board? Please send a screenshot of the affected board.
What are the Area Paths and Iterations assigned to the team of the backlog? Please send a screenshot of the team configuration.
Do you have any filters currently set?
If the Work Item is not visible in the Board or Backlog, is it visible when searched in the search bar or returned in a query?
Is the query a stored query or a new query?
If stored, what is the query URL?
Do the results improve if the query is simplified?
Please send a screenshot of the query statement and a snapshot of the results, including the queried fields, Area Path, and Iteration Path.
Is the project using an Inherited Process Template or an XML/Hosted XML process template?
If Inherited, which process is it inheriting from?
If XML/Hosted XML, please export the process template of the project and attach it to the case.
